Paragraph: In addition , the increased amount of TPD caused the appearance of a new absorption band around 500- 600 nm , which can be attributed to the intramolecular charge transfer ( ICT ) band from BDTT to TPD.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| TPD (Thiodiglycolic acid) |
| BDTT (Bis(4-diethylamino)phenyl) |

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| --- |
| TPD |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material Name":

* "In addition" (this is a conjunction connecting two clauses, not a material name)
* "TPD caused" (this is a verb phrase, not a material name)
* "BDTT to TPD" (this is a phrase, not a material name)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
